meanings.definition: Make as large or great as possible.
meanings.sent1: She is maximizing her savings by putting money into a piggy bank every day.
meanings.sent2: The company is maximizing its profits by selling products online.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was maximizing its acorn collection, storing them in every nook and cranny.
meanings.sent4: The student was maximizing his study time, absorbing every detail of the textbook.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was maximizing the sunlight for the plants, arranging them strategically in the garden.

meanings.definition: To increase to the greatest possible amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: He is maximizing his workout by adding more weights to his routine.
meanings.sent2: The chef is maximizing the flavor of the dish by adding fresh herbs.
meanings.sent3: The cat was maximizing its nap time, finding the coziest spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The athlete was maximizing her speed, pushing herself to the limit in the race.
meanings.sent5: The artist was maximizing the contrast in the painting, using bold colors and dark shadows.
